description: Gets details about a guardrail. If you don't specify a version, the response returns details for the DRAFT version.

parameters.name: guardrailIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the guardrail for which to get details. This can be an ID or the ARN.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the guardrail.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the guardrail.

nested_items.name: guardrailId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the guardrail.

nested_items.name: guardrailArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the guardrail.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the guardrail.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the guardrail.

nested_items.name: topicPolicy
nested_items.description: The topic policy that was configured for the guardrail.

nested_items.name: topics
nested_items.description: A list of policies related to topics that the guardrail should deny.

nested_items.description: A list of words configured for the guardrail.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: Text of the word configured for the guardrail to block.

nested_items.name: inputAction
nested_items.description: The action to take when harmful content is detected in the input. Supported values include:
BLOCK --- Block the content and replace it with blocked messaging.
NONE --- Take no action but return detection information in the trace response.

nested_items.name: outputAction
nested_items.description: The action to take when harmful content is detected in the output. Supported values include:
BLOCK --- Block the content and replace it with blocked messaging.
NONE --- Take no action but return detection information in the trace response.

nested_items.name: inputEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether guardrail evaluation is enabled on the input. When disabled, you aren't charged for the evaluation. The evaluation doesn't appear in the response.

nested_items.name: outputEnabled

nested_items.name: updatedAt

nested_items.description: Appears if the status is FAILED. A list of reasons for why the guardrail failed to be created, updated, versioned, or deleted.
